alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GADSDEN... NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...NORTHEASTERN LEON...SOUTHEASTERN DECATUR... SOUTHERN GRADY AND SOUTHWESTERN THOMAS COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 646 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Thomasville to near Havana to 9 miles south of Bainbridge. Movement was south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Havana, Attapulgus, Freemont, Littman, Darsey, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Fred George Park, Laingkat, Calvary, Killearn Estates, Shady Rest, Amsterdam, Branchville, Hinson, and Dogtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
